Changeset.Change: Adapted to New HomeLibrary
Minor restyling
CM dependencies are removed
Compatible with the new ASL content library
The xml payload of an object is displayed using a generic viewer
Project is mavenized
Created a content visualizer for the OAI_DC objects
Created a metadata visualizer for the OAI_DC objects
Added the view metadata and view content option
Created a content visualizer for the FIGIS objects
Created a metadata visualizer for the FIGIS objects
Moved the view_metadata option from the tab menu to the options menu
Fixed the presentation of the "browse fields" operation results
Fixed the query that was sent to the from a browse field result
Fixed the "save query to basket" option
Browsable field name is used in the displayable query
Updates to the save results to basket functionality. A default 'basket' folder is used for saving objects
For each result object the actual content is also saved if it is of an known type
Fixed some issued related to the query label
GWT version is updated
Update in the search method of the ASL
Added the tagcloud visualization pop-up for each query
Added the navigation bar in the bottom to ease the results navigation
Minor change in the way the exceptions from workspace are handled. Avoid to throw exception if the store of external documents fail
Fixed a problem when the user was trying to save a query to the workspace
The actual query is now saved to the workspace
